existing_features.title: Ensure that a user authenticated with the email finproledge@gmail.com is reliably granted admin access in the AdminGuard component, bypassing or correctly resolving the backend role check so the admin portal renders without being blocked or redirected.
Ensure the Navigation component also surfaces admin-only links (e.g., Admin Dashboard) when the authenticated user's email is finproledge@gmail.com, consistent with the AdminGuard fix.

new_feature_requests.summary: Audit and fix the backend role-check logic so that the principal associated with finproledge@gmail.com is recognised as an admin by the isAdmin (or equivalent) backend function, ensuring AdminGuard's backend query path also succeeds for this user.
